question:
Which among the following was / were the recommendations of Sachar Committee with reference to the minorities affairs in India:
1. Creation of a National Data Bank where all relevant data for various Socio Religious Communities are maintained
2. Elimination of the anomalies with respect to reserved constituencies under the delimitation scheme
3. UGC should evolve a system where part of the allocation to colleges and universities is linked to the diversity in the student population.
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The above recommendations are of Rajender Sachar Committee that was appointed by Prime Minister Manmohan Singh for working out a report on the Socio-economic and education status of the Muslim community in India. The report was tabled in the parliament on November 30, 2006 and came up with the suggestions and solutions to include the mainstream Indian Muslims.
